works.description:
The main content on this page titled, Nursing Home Abuse, is copied from my website, OklaLawyer.com. Here is an example of the first paragraph that copies our content; 

"According to a report by CNN “Almost one of every three nursing homes in the United States has been cited for nursing home abuse or violation”. This equates to over 5,000 of the more then 17,000 nursing homes in the United States having been cited for nursing home abuse. The violations that the nursing homes were cited for all had the potential to at least harm the residents and 1,600 of the violations were considered severe enough to cause seriously a serious personal injury or wrongful death."
